name: Flappy Memes
description:
Flappy memes! Ever wanted to flap your favourite meme faces through these pipes like a bird? Now you can!

Select one of many meme faces to play as - troll face, derpina, megusta, you name it!

Missed out a memes you wanted adding in? Feel free to suggest it and I will add it in soon (if it is a good suggestion).

Thanks, if the application becomes a success, I will continue updating it even more!

Flap your troll face or derpina across pipes while collecting delicious food and drinks.

More features to come soon!
